attributes.action: Integrate a custom games matchmaking into halo 3.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Halo 3 introduced forge in 2007, this is a great leap in game designing at home, unfortunately we can only play with people on our friends list. It would be a great idea if we could enter matchmaking and play other people's maps and game variants.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
